lead_paragraph: Most of the justices seemed convinced that conditions in California’s prisons violate the Constitution, but it was not clear that a majority was ready to require a reduction in the prison population.
snippet: Most of the justices seemed convinced that conditions in California’s prisons violate the Constitution, but it was not clear that a majority was ready to require a reduction in the prison population.

headline.main: Supreme Court Hears Arguments on California Prison Crowding
headline.seo: Supreme Court Hears Arguments on California Prisons
headline.print_headline: Justices Hear Arguments on California Prison Crowding
